item.name: inverse.cgmap
item.desc: Mapping file for analysis. Currently also during coarse-grained simulations, a mappin file has to be specified which is only a 1:1 mapping. This will change in the future.

item.name: non-bonded
item.desc: Section for a non-bonded interaction. All sub-tags will be later on specified in interaction.* since most of them are identical to bonded interactions.

item.name: bonded
item.desc: Section for a bonded interaction. All sub-tags will be later on specified in interaction.* since most of them are identical to non-bonded interactions.

item.name: interaction
item.desc: fooo

item.name: interaction.name
item.desc: Name of the interaction

item.name: interaction.inverse.target
item.desc: target distribution (rdf), just give gromas rdf.xvg

item.name: interaction.type1
item.desc: Only for non-bonded. Bead type 1 of non-bonded interaction.

item.name: interaction.type2
item.desc: Only for non-bonded. Bead type 2 of non-bonded interaction.

item.name: interaction.min
item.desc: lower bound of interval for potential table in which calculations are performed.

item.name: interaction.max
item.desc: upper bound of interval for potential table in which calculations are performed.

item.name: interaction.step
item.desc: step size of interval for potential table in which calculations are performed.

item.name: interaction.inverse.do_potential
item.desc: Update cacly for potential update. 1 means update, 0 don't update. 1 1 0 means update 2 iterations, then don't update, then repeated.

item.name: interaction.inverse.post_update
item.desc: Additional post processing of dU before added to potential. This is a list of scripts which are called separated by space.

item.name: interaction.inverse.post_update_options
item.desc: This sectioncontains all options for post update scripts.

item.name: interaction.inverse.post_add
item.desc: Additional post processing of U after dU added to potential. See interaction.post_update for details.

item.name: interaction.inverse.imc
item.desc: Section containing inverse monte carlo specific options.

item.name: interaction.inverse.imc.group
item.desc: Group of interaction. Cross-correlations of all members of a group are taken into account for calculating the update. I no cross correlations should be calculated, interactions have to be put into different groujps.

item.name: interaction.inverse.gromacs
item.desc: This section contains gromacs specific options if gromacs is used as simulatiion program.

item.name: interaction.inverse.gromacs.table
item.desc: Name of file for tabulated potential of this interaction. This fill will be created from the internal tabulated potential format for every run.

item.name: inverse
item.desc: general options for inverse script

item.name: inverse.p_target
item.desc: target pressure

item.name: inverse.kBT
item.desc: kBT (300*0.00831451 gromacs units)

item.name: inverse.program
item.desc: simulation package to be used (currently only gromacs)

item.name: inverse.gromacs
item.desc: gromacs specific options

item.name: inverse.gromacs.equi_time
item.desc: begin analysis after this time

item.name: inverse.gromacs.first_frame
item.desc: trash so many frames at the beginning

item.name: inverse.gromacs.table_bins
item.desc: grid for table*.xvg !

item.name: inverse.gromacs.pot_max
item.desc: cut the potential at this value (gromacs bug)

item.name: inverse.gromacs.table_extend
item.desc: extend the tables to this value

item.name: inverse.gromacs.topol
item.desc: topology + trajectory. Be careful, do not change yet!

item.name: inverse.gromacs.traj
item.desc: topology + trajectory. Be careful, do not change yet!

item.name: inverse.filelist
item.desc: these files are copied for each new run

item.name: inverse.iterations_max
item.desc: do so many iterations

item.name: inverse.method
item.desc: ibm: inverse boltzmann imc: inverse monte carlo

item.name: inverse.scriptdir
item.desc: directory for user scripts (e.g. \$PWD)

item.name: inverse.log_file
item.desc: write log to this file

item.name: inverse.imc
item.desc: general imc specific options

item.name: inverse.imc.solver
item.desc: solver to solve linear equation system, can be octave or matlab
